name: Tilda
description: Enter spring in this seasons catwalk trend of pastels. Designers Remix coat TILDA is classic with its long silhuette and luxurious cashmere wool blend. Create a stylish spring look with the wool knit STACY, the short LARASKIRT and fashionable DINA boots.

name: Marley
description: Designers Remix crepe de chinesilk dress MARLEY is a modern version of the little black dress with its unique design and loose fit. Pair it with a leather clutch and statement necklace for a powerful party look.

name: Akita
description: A minimalistic wool coat with sharp cut details is a musthave this season. The  oversize coat AKITA holds you warm and stylish with its soft boucle wool and mohair blend. Go for a edgy look by adding a pair of long fringde leathergloves.

name: Mariaa
description: Go short this winter with the sporty loose fit skirt MARIAA in fine crepe with zipper side pockets. The skirt is unique with a shorter lenght at the front. Perfect for a casual day look or a special christmas occasion.

name: Futures
description: Stand out with the futuristic wool blend jacket FUTURES in shiny prussian blue and side zipper pockets. Create a cool minimalistic trendy look with a oversize shirt and crepe pants. Add a pair of high heels for a finishing touch.
additional_info: 47% acrylic, 24% polyester, 19% wool, 5% polyamid, 5% other fibers
